div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 08:35 am CDT

div.div: A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 4pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 77. West southwest wind 5 to 15 mph becoming north in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 43. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
A 20 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 74. West northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.
